name: Addicted!
description:
A casual dungeon crawler where the player must use substances to boost strength, speed and night vision, at the cost of health. Dodge fireball-shooting monsters and watch out for overdose! 


Sus Snacks: -2 hearts, +Strength


Perplex Powder: -3 hearts, +Speed


Crunchy Crystals: -4 hearts, +Speed, Strength, Night Vision

Open-source available on the GitHub repository.
